original: Lantz, Sven Theodor, redaktionssekreterare, Alingsås, f. 23/5/00 i Enköp. av pastor O. Th. L. o. Klara Carlsson. G. 27 m. Stina Magnér. Barn: Bo f. 32. — Volontär v. Medelpads Dagblad 19, medarb. i östgöten 20, i Bohusläningen 22-24, red:sekr. i Strömstads Tidn. 25, meclarb. i Hand:tidn. Veckoblad 26, redisekr. i Elfsborgs Läns Tidn. o. Alingsås Tidn. sed. 27, verskåsör i Handitidn. Veckoblad sed. 24, regelbund. medarb. i radio (Verskrönika hemma fr. går’n) sed. 41. Sign. bl. a.: Adrianson, Theo. Res. t. Engl. f. stud. av Londonpressen 30 o. som Sv. journifören. Gbgskrets \stip. f. stud. av eng. landsortspressen 32. Medl. av Publ :kl. sed. 29, rev. i v. kretsen 34, medl. av Sv. journifören. Skr.: Alingsås Segelsällsk. 50-årsmin-nesskr. (28), Göt. förb. Alströmerloges 50-årsskr. (30), AHngsås fabr:- o. hant-v:fören. 20-àrsminnesskr. (30) m. fl.
translated: Lantz, Sven Theodor, editorial secretary, Alingsås, b. 23/5/00 in Enköping, son of Pastor O. Th. L. and Klara Carlsson. Married on 27/xx to Stina Magnér. Children: Bo, b. 32. - Voluntary worker at Medelpads Dagblad in 1919, collaborator at östgöten in 1920, at Bohusläningen from 1922 to 1924, editorial secretary at Strömstads Tidning in 1925, collaborator at Handels-Tidningen Veckoblad in 1926, editorial secretary at Elfsborgs Läns Tidning and Alingsås Tidning since 1927, verse writer at Handels-Tidningen Veckoblad since 1924, regular collaborator on radio (Verskrönika hemma fr. går’n) since 1941. Also signed as Adrianson, Theo. Traveled to England for studying London's press in 1930 and as a scholarship recipient from the Swedish Journalist Association's Gothenburg district for studying the English regional press in 1932. Member of the Publicist Club since 1929, revised in the west district in 1934, member of the Swedish Journalist Association. Writings: Alingsås Segelsällskap's 50-year anniversary writing (1928), Göteborgs förbund Alströmerloge's 50-year anniversary writing (1930), Alingsås factory and trade association's 20-year anniversary writing (1930), among others.

structured.name: Sven Theodor Lantz
publications: Alingsås factory and trade association's 20-year anniversary writing (1930)
